overview: Sportsmanship, teamwork and sticking with it are the themes that run through this energetic collection of music videos for kids! Pull on your uniform and join the team as the Kidsongs Kids conquer the baseball diamond and basketball court. Be dazzled by the young gymnasts on the balance beam and tumbling mats. Cheer for the runners racing for the finish line, share the excitement of sailing and surfing, and explore the fun-filled kids' world of sports with such songs as "I Get Around," "Footloose," "Centerfield," and more!
title: Kidsongs: Let's Play Ball
